speaker: Glacier Pass
lines: You enter the pass where blue ice rises in waves.
Rime crackles under your boots as wind cuts across the ridge.
Sunlight scatters through bubbles trapped in the ice.
A faint reflection moves under your feet.
Old pitons mark a snow-choked chute.
A howl carries ahead on the wind.
